ARABIC: وَإِن مِّن شَىْءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There is nothing that does not have its stores with Us and We only send it down in a known measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Of all things there are We have the stores, and send them down in determined measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There is nothing except that its treasuries are with Us and We do not send it down except in a known measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: With Us is the source of everything and We do not send it down except in a known quantity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And there is not a thing the treasure* of which is not with Us; and We do not send it down except by a known measure. (* The power to create it.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And there is not a thing, but the supplies for it are with Us, and We do not send it down but in a known measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And there is not a thing but with Us are the treasures of it, and We do not send it down but in a known measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Naught is there, but its treasuries are with Us, and We send it not down but in a known measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And there is not a thing but with Us are the stores thereof. And we send it not down save in appointed measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There is not a thing but its storehouses are with Us. But We only send down each thing in an appropriate measure:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And there is not of aught but with Us are the treasures thereof, and We send it not down save in a measure known
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is not a thing but that its sources are with Us, and We do not send it down except in a known measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And there is not a thing but its (sources and) treasures (inexhaustible) are with Us; but We only send down thereof in due and ascertainable measures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And there is not a thing, but with Us are the stores thereof. And We send it not down except in a known measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And there is not a thing but with Us are its treasuries, and We do not send it down except in a known measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: There is not a thing but with Us are its stores, and We send it down only in precise measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:21] And there is not a thing but that the stores thereof, the keys to its stores, are with Us, and We do not send it down except in a known measure, according to the benefits [of all creatures].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And there is not a thing) of vegetation, fruits or rains (but with Us are the stores thereof) except that We have its keys; its keys are in Our Hand not in yours. (And We send it) i.e. rain (not down save in appointed measure) with a specific quantity and weight known to the One Who stores it.
